service.name: /psal112.ps
service.query: SELECT A.CONF_FLAG , A.STR_CD , A.STR_NAME , A.DEPT_CD , A.TEAM_CD , A.PC_CD , A.ORG_NAME , ? AS PLAN_YEAR , NVL(A.CONF_DT,'') AS CONF_DT , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_TOT , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_TOT , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_TOT , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_TOT , ROUND(DECODE(SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_TOT) OVER (), 0, 0, (SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_TOT) OVER (PARTITION BY A.PC_CD) / SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_TOT) OVER ()) * 100), 2) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_TOT , ROUND(DECODE(SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_TOT) OVER (), 0, 0, (SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_TOT) OVER (PARTITION BY A.PC_CD) / SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_TOT) OVER ()) * 100), 2) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_TOT --, ROUND((SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_TOT) OVER (PARTITION BY A.PC_CD) / SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_TOT) OVER ()) * 100, 2) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_TOT --, ROUND((SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_TOT) OVER (PARTITION BY A.PC_CD) / SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_TOT) OVER ()) * 100, 2) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_TOT , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_JAN , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_JAN , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_JAN , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_JAN , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_JAN , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_JAN , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_FEB , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_FEB , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_FEB , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_FEB , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_FEB , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_FEB , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_MAR , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_MAR , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_MAR , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_MAR , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_MAR , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_MAR , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_APR , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_APR , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_APR , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_APR , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_APR , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_APR , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_MAY , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_MAY , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_MAY , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_MAY , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_MAY , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_MAY , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_JUN , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_JUN , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_JUN , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_JUN , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_JUN , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_JUN , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_JUL , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_JUL , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_JUL , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_JUL , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_JUL , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_JUL , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_AUG , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_AUG , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_AUG , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_AUG , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_AUG , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_AUG , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_SEP , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_SEP , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_SEP , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_SEP , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_SEP , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_SEP , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_OCT , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_OCT , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_OCT , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_OCT , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_OCT , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_OCT , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_NOV , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_NOV , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_NOV , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_NOV , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_NOV , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_NOV , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_DEC , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_DEC , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_DEC , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_DEC , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_DEC , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_DEC FROM ( SELECT A.CONF_FLAG , A.STR_CD , A.STR_NAME , A.DEPT_CD , A.TEAM_CD , A.PC_CD , A.PC_NAME AS ORG_NAME , A.CONF_DT , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT1 + A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT2 + A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT3 + A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT4 + A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT5 + A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT6 + A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT7 + A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT8 + A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT9 + A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT10 + A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT11 + A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT12 AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_TOT , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT1 + A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT2 + A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT3 + A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT4 + A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT5 + A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT6 + A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT7 + A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT8 + A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT9 + A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT10 + A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT11 + A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT12 AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_TOT , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT1 + A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT2 + A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT3 + A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT4 + A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT5 + A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT6 + A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT7 + A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT8 + A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT9 + A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT10 + A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT11 + A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT12 AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_TOT , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT1 + A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT2 + A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT3 + A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT4 + A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT5 + A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT6 + A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT7 + A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT8 + A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT9 + A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT10 + A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT11 + A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT12 AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_TOT , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT1 AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_JAN , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT1 AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_JAN , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT1 AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_JAN , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT1 AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_JAN , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE1 AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_JAN , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE1 AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_JAN , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT2 AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_FEB , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT2 AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_FEB , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT2 AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_FEB , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT2 AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_FEB , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE2 AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_FEB , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE2 AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_FEB , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT3 AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_MAR , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT3 AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_MAR , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT3 AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_MAR , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT3 AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_MAR , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE3 AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_MAR , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE3 AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_MAR , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT4 AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_APR , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT4 AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_APR , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT4 AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_APR , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT4 AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_APR , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE4 AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_APR , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE4 AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_APR , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT5 AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_MAY , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT5 AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_MAY , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT5 AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_MAY , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT5 AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_MAY , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE5 AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_MAY , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE5 AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_MAY , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT6 AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_JUN , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT6 AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_JUN , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT6 AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_JUN , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT6 AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_JUN , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE6 AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_JUN , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE6 AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_JUN , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT7 AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_JUL , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT7 AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_JUL , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT7 AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_JUL , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT7 AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_JUL , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE7 AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_JUL , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE7 AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_JUL , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT8 AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_AUG , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT8 AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_AUG , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT8 AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_AUG , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT8 AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_AUG , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE8 AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_AUG , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE8 AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_AUG , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT9 AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_SEP , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT9 AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_SEP , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT9 AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_SEP , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT9 AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_SEP , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE9 AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_SEP , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE9 AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_SEP , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT10 AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_OCT , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT10 AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_OCT , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT10 AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_OCT , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT10 AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_OCT , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE10 AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_OCT , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE10 AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_OCT , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT11 AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_NOV , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT11 AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_NOV , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT11 AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_NOV , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT11 AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_NOV , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE11 AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_NOV , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE11 AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_NOV , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT12 AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT_DEC , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT12 AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT_DEC , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT12 AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT_DEC , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT12 AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT_DEC , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE12 AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE_DEC , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE12 AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE_DEC FROM ( SELECT A.STR_CD , A.STR_NAME , A.DEPT_CD , A.TEAM_CD , A.PC_CD , A.PC_NAME , DECODE(NVL(A.CONF_FLAG, 'N'), 'N', 'F', 'T') AS CONF_FLAG , A.CONF_DT , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '01' THEN A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT1 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '01' THEN A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT1 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '01' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT1 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '01' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT1 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '01' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE1 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '01' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE1 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '02' THEN A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT2 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '02' THEN A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT2 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '02' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT2 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '02' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT2 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '02' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE2 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '02' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE2 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '03' THEN A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT3 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '03' THEN A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT3 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '03' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT3 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '03' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT3 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '03' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE3 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '03' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE3 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '04' THEN A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT4 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '04' THEN A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT4 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '04' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT4 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '04' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT4 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '04' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE4 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '04' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE4 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '05' THEN A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT5 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '05' THEN A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT5 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '05' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT5 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '05' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT5 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '05' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE5 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '05' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE5 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '06' THEN A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT6 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '06' THEN A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT6 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '06' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT6 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '06' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT6 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '06' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE6 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '06' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE6 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '07' THEN A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT7 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '07' THEN A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT7 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '07' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT7 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '07' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT7 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '07' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE7 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '07' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE7 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '08' THEN A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT8 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '08' THEN A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT8 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '08' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT8 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '08' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT8 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '08' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE8 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '08' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE8 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '09' THEN A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT9 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '09' THEN A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT9 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '09' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT9 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '09' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT9 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '09' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE9 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '09' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE9 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '10' THEN A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT10 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '10' THEN A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT10 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '10' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT10 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '10' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT10 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '10' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE10 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '10' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE10 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '11' THEN A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT11 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '11' THEN A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT11 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '11' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT11 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '11' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT11 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '11' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE11 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '11' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE11 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '12' THEN A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT12 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '12' THEN A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT12 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '12' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT12 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '12' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT12 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '12' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE12 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '12' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE12 FROM ( SELECT A.STR_CD , C.STR_NAME , A.ORG_CD , A.PLAN_YM , A.ORG_LEVEL , A.DEPT_CD , A.TEAM_CD , A.PC_CD , D.ORG_SHORT_NAME AS PC_NAME , A.PUMBUN_CD , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE , SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM, 5, 2) AS PLAN_MM , A.CONF_FLAG , A.CONF_DT FROM DPS.PS_PLANPUMBUN A , DPS.PC_STRPBN B , DPS.PC_STRMST C , DPS.PC_ORGMST D WHERE A.STR_CD = ? AND A.DEPT_CD = ? AND A.TEAM_CD = ? AND A.PC_CD LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND A.PLAN_YM LIKE ? || '%' AND A.ORG_LEVEL = '4' AND A.ORG_CD = SUBSTR(B.SALE_ORG_CD, 1, 8) || '00' AND A.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND A.PUMBUN_CD = B.PUMBUN_CD --AND B.BIZ_TYPE != '5' AND A.STR_CD = C.STR_CD AND A.STR_CD = D.STR_CD AND A.ORG_CD = D.ORG_CD AND D.ORG_FLAG = ? AND EXISTS ( SELECT MYORG.USER_ID FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.STR_CD = A.STR_CD AND MYORG.DEPT_CD = A.DEPT_CD AND MYORG.TEAM_CD = A.TEAM_CD AND MYORG.PC_CD = A.PC_CD AND MYORG.PUMBUN_CD = A.PUMBUN_CD AND MYORG.USER_ID = ? ) ) A GROUP BY A.STR_CD , A.STR_NAME , A.DEPT_CD , A.TEAM_CD , A.PC_CD , A.PC_NAME , A.CONF_FLAG , A.CONF_DT ) A ) A ORDER BY A.PC_CD

A.PLAN_MM = '02' THEN A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT2 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '02' THEN A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT2 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '02' THEN ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT3 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '03' THEN A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT3 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '03' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT3 , '12' THEN A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT12 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '12' THEN A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT12 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '12' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT12 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '12' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT12 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '12' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE12 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PLAN_MM = '12' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE ELSE 0 END) AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE12 FROM ( SELECT A.STR_CD , A.ORG_CD , A.PLAN_YM , A.ORG_LEVEL , A.DEPT_CD , A.TEAM_CD , A.PC_CD , A.PUMBUN_CD , B.PUMBUN_NAME , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE , '1' AS BF_FLAG , SUBSTR(A.PLAN_YM, 5, 2) AS PLAN_MM FROM DPS.PS_PLANPUMBUN A , DPS.PC_STRPBN B WHERE A.STR_CD = ? AND A.DEPT_CD = ? AND A.TEAM_CD = ? AND A.PC_CD = ? AND A.PLAN_YM LIKE ? || '%' AND A.ORG_LEVEL = '4' AND A.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND A.PUMBUN_CD = B.PUMBUN_CD AND A.ORG_CD = SUBSTR(B.SALE_ORG_CD, 1, 8) || '00' --AND B.BIZ_TYPE != '5' ) A GROUP BY A.BF_FLAG , A.STR_CD , A.ORG_CD , A.ORG_LEVEL , A.DEPT_CD , A.TEAM_CD , A.PC_CD , A.PUMBUN_CD , A.PUMBUN_NAME ) A WHERE 1 = 1 AND EXISTS ( SELECT MYORG.USER_ID FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.STR_CD = A.STR_CD AND MYORG.DEPT_CD = A.DEPT_CD AND MYORG.TEAM_CD = A.TEAM_CD AND MYORG.PC_CD = A.PC_CD AND MYORG.PUMBUN_CD = A.PUMBUN_CD AND MYORG.USER_ID = ? ) ) A ORDER BY A.PUMBUN_CD , A.BF_FLAG

SELECT A.PUMBUN_CD , C.PUMBUN_NAME AS ORG_NAME FROM ( SELECT A.PLAN_YM , A.STR_CD , A.DEPT_CD , A.TEAM_CD , A.PC_CD , A.ORG_CD , A.PUMBUN_CD FROM DPS.PS_PLANPUMBUN A , DPS.PC_STRPBN B WHERE A.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND A.PUMBUN_CD = B.PUMBUN_CD --AND B.BIZ_TYPE != '5' AND A.STR_CD = ? AND A.DEPT_CD = ? AND A.TEAM_CD = ? AND A.PC_CD = ? AND A.ORG_LEVEL = '4' AND A.PLAN_YM LIKE ? || '%' ) A , DPS.PC_ORGMST B , DPS.PC_STRPBN C WHERE A.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD AND A.TEAM_CD = B.TEAM_CD AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD AND A.STR_CD = C.STR_CD AND SUBSTR(A.ORG_CD,1,8) = SUBSTR(C.SALE_ORG_CD,1,8) AND B.ORG_FLAG = ? ORDER BY A.PUMBUN_CD , C.PUMBUN_NAME

SELECT CONF_FLAG FROM DPS.PS_PLANPUMBUN A , DPS.PC_ORGMST B , DPS.PC_STRPBN C WHERE A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD AND A.STR_CD = C.STR_CD AND A.PUMBUN_CD = C.PUMBUN_CD --AND C.BIZ_TYPE != '5' AND B.ORG_FLAG = ? AND A.STR_CD = ? AND A.DEPT_CD = ? AND A.TEAM_CD = ? AND A.ORG_LEVEL = '4' AND A.PLAN_YM = ? || '01' ORDER BY A.ORG_CD

SELECT CONF_FLAG FROM DPS.PS_PLANPC A , DPS.PC_ORGMST B WHERE A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD AND B.ORG_FLAG = ? AND A.STR_CD = ? AND A.DEPT_CD = ? AND A.TEAM_CD = ? AND A.PC_CD = ? AND A.ORG_LEVEL = '4' AND A.PLAN_YM = ? || '01' AND A.CONF_FLAG = 'Y' ORDER BY A.ORG_CD

UPDATE DPS.PS_PLANPUMBUN A SET A.CONF_DT = ? , A.CONF_ID = ? , A.CONF_FLAG = ? , A.MOD_DATE = SYSDATE , A.MOD_ID = ? WHERE A.STR_CD = ? AND A.DEPT_CD = ? AND A.TEAM_CD = ? AND A.PC_CD = ? AND A.ORG_LEVEL = '4' AND A.PLAN_YM LIKE ? || '%' AND NVL(A.CONF_FLAG,'N') = ? AND EXISTS ( SELECT PUMBUN_CD FROM DPS.PC_STRPBN WHERE STR_CD = A.STR_CD AND PUMBUN_CD = A.PUMBUN_CD --AND BIZ_TYPE != '5' )

-- PC별 월별 매출계획 확정/확정취소 MERGE INTO DPS.PS_PLANPC A USING ( SELECT ? AS STR_CD , ? AS PLAN_YM , ? || ? || ? || ? || '00' AS ORG_CD FROM DUAL ) B ON ( A.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND A.PLAN_YM = B.PLAN_YM AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT = ? , A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT = ? , A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT = ? , A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT = ? , A.BFYY_PROF_CRATE = ? , A.BFYY_SALE_CRATE = ? , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT = ? , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT = ? , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT = ? , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT = ? , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE = ? , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE = ? , A.CONF_DT = ? , A.CONF_ID = ? , A.CONF_FLAG = ? , A.MOD_DATE = SYSDATE , A.MOD_ID = ? WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STR_CD , A.PLAN_YM , A.ORG_CD , A.ORG_LEVEL , A.DEPT_CD , A.TEAM_CD , A.PC_CD , A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT , A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT , A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT , A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT , A.BFYY_PROF_CRATE , A.BFYY_SALE_CRATE , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE , A.CONF_DT , A.CONF_ID , A.CONF_FLAG , A.REG_DATE , A.REG_ID , A.MOD_DATE , A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? || ? || ? || ? || '00' , '4' , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , SYSDATE , ? )
